sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.BubbleChartWorkbenchAjaxService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Ajax utility which is responsible for fetching data required to create Bubble Workbench</description>
        <name>BubbleChartWorkbenchAjaxService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BubbleChartWorkbenchAjaxService = Class.create();
BubbleChartWorkbenchAjaxService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getData : function() {
		var workbenchId = this.getParameter('sysparm_workbench_id');
		var sys_ids = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_ids');
		return (new BubbleWorkbenchService()).getWorkbenchData(workbenchId,sys_ids);
	},
	
	updatePoint : function() {
		var workbenchId = this.getParameter('sysparm_workbench_id');
		var sysId = this.getParameter('sys_id');
		var pointX = this.getParameter('sysparm_point_x');
		var pointY = this.getParameter('sysparm_point_y');
		var pointZ = this.getParameter('sysparm_point_z');		
		return (new BubbleWorkbenchService()).updatePoint(workbenchId,sysId, pointX, pointY, pointZ);
	},

	type: 'ProjectWorkbenchAjaxService'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-11-02 22:45:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0e837f03c30031009a08d27af3d3aea8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>BubbleChartWorkbenchAjaxService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Bubble Chart Workbench" source="com.snc.bubblechart_workbench">fbffcee747e64210cd4e1ce4316d436b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0e837f03c30031009a08d27af3d3aea8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2015-01-05 22:09:11</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
